definition: relating to or resembling a member of the class Arachnida, air-breathing arthropods characterized by simple eyes and four pairs of legs
details:
adjective
- relating to or resembling a member of the class Arachnida
= synonyms: arachnidian, spidery, spiderlike, spiderly
noun
- air-breathing arthropods characterized by simple eyes and four pairs of legs
= synonyms: arachnid
- the middle of the 3 meninges
= synonyms: arachnoid membrane
